questions.question: What are the components of a personal statement?

choices.answer: Topic, Show not tell, self-reflection, growth, future self, conventions
Topic, Tell not show, self-reflection, growth, present self, conventions

questions.question: If you miss class, where can you find the class free writes?

choices.answer: If you miss class, you don't have to do the free writes?
The class slides (course materials topic on GC) & in the asynch assignment

questions.question: When and where do Mrs. M & Ms. N have office hours?

choices.answer: Mondays after school @ new zoom link every week
Tuesdays during our class period on the same zoom link
Fridays all day @ the same zoom link
Tuesdays all day @ a new zoom link every week

questions.question: If you want to improve your grade, what should you do?

choices.answer: Read the marking period check in for your options
Email/call your teacher the last day of the marking period.
Come to office hours and ask your teacher

questions.question: If you think you will need extra time for an assignment, what should you do?

choices.answer: Rush through the assignment and hand it in.
Email your teacher & ask for an extension at least 3 DAYS before deadline.
Email your teacher and ask for an extension the DAY the assignment is due.

questions.question: What is the penalty for late assignments submitted 1-3 days after the deadline?
What is the penalty for late assignments submitted 3+ days after the deadline?

choices.answer: Assignment not accepted unless listed in the marking period check in. (= 0)
There is no penalty. You can turn it in whenever.

questions.question: Do jobs or colleges have late penalties after Marble Hill?

choices.answer: Yes, they are more lenient than Marble Hill
No (there are late penalties for bills, though). I can ask for an extension

questions.question: What's the best way to earn a perfect score on weekly participation?

choices.answer: Submit assignments on time, participate in class and turn on your webcam
Submit assignments on time and participate in class and turn
Submit most assignments on time & participate in class

questions.question: What can I do if I have an excused absence?

choices.answer: Not make up the missing assignments.
Provide teacher with an excused note & complete missed assignments
A person, place, a thing or an idea

questions.question: How many times, can I revise a low scored assignment for the average of 2 scores?

choices.answer: As many times as needed, before the end of the MP, and email the teacher
As many times as possible, anytime in the year

questions.question: Can I pass this class without submitting a project, even if I have a score of 65 or up?

choices.answer: An action or state of being
a person, place, a thing or an idea

questions.question: What makes a complete sentence or a complete thought?
What is the subject of this sentence? "The students are playing kahoot."
What is the predicate of this sentence? "The students are playing kahoot."
What subject does this English class focus on in the fall semester?

choices.answer: Sociology= the study of how societies function
Psychology= the study of the human behavior and how our minds work
